Name: Shadow War Horse Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
This Shadow War Horse enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed with High Altitude Flight.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Shadow War Horse enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed with High Altitude Flight. Double-click your destination on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can increase your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
This Shadow War Horse enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed with High Altitude Flight.
